newsitem.title: TURKEY: Turkish mkts await t-bill auction result.
newsitem.headline: Turkish mkts await t-bill auction result.

text.p: 1000 GMT - Turkish mkts await Treasury's 9-mth bill auction with Wednesday settlement. Bankers said mild demand awaited after 75.7 trln lira sale in last Tuesday's 6-mth bill auction.
* Bond yields rose by around 1.5 percentage points to 98.5 pct levels in 1997-maturity papers and to 101 pct levels in 1998 maturity papers.
* Money mkt opened 21 trln lira long and avrg o/n money rate fell to 70 pct and avrg o/n repo rate to 67.72 pct from Monday's 71.82 and 70.62 pct.
* Currency trade very thin ahead of auction results.
